title: President, Computer Science Club
overview: Led a team of 60+ students in organizing hackathons, workshops, and tech talks.

details.description: Managed club operations, coordinated with sponsors, and organized events to promote computer science education and community building.
details.impact: Organized 3 major hackathons with 300+ participants, secured $75K in sponsorships, increased club membership by 200%, and established partnerships with 10+ tech companies for recruiting events.

title: Lead Developer, University Mobile App
overview: Led development of official university mobile app used by 15,000+ students.

details.description: Managed team of 5 developers building cross-platform mobile app for campus services including course registration, dining hall menus, event calendar, and campus maps.
details.impact: App downloaded by 15,000+ students, 4.6/5 rating on app stores, reduced paper waste by digitizing campus services, and improved student engagement with university events by 40%.

title: Competitive Programming Team Member
overview: Represented university in regional and national programming competitions.

details.description: Trained 10+ hours weekly on algorithmic problem-solving, participated in team competitions, and mentored junior students.
details.impact: Placed 12th in ACM ICPC Regional Finals 2019, solved 500+ problems on competitive programming platforms, and mentored 20+ students in algorithms and data structures.
